Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-39936 affecting package qtbase for versions less than 6.6.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-39936 affecting package qtbase for versions less than 6.6.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
